description: Jessy is a fashion designer with sketches for a new clothing line. She can send some or all sketches to Bob, a tailor with expertise in textiles and crafting. Bob will develop prototype garments from the designs he receives. He then decides how many completed garments he will send back to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: Share 30% of the designs with the tailor
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: Share all designs with the tailor

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: Return 40-50% of the developed garments to the designer
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: Return more than 80% of the developed garments to the designer
